effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.
effect.full: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit. This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust. This ability takes effect before mummy.

description.black-white: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
description.black-2-white-2: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
description.x-y: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
description.sun-moon: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
description.sword-shield: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.
